author: Gregory Barber
title: One Way to Potentially Track Covid-19? Sewage Surveillance
description: How many people have been infected with the new coronavirus? A group of Bay Area researchers aims to find out—by tracking what's in the local wastewater.
content: Nasa Sinnott-Armstrong, a graduate student at Stanford, does not have much experience as a sewage couriernormally, theyre busy studying genetics. But as with many of us, the pandemic is upending routines. Since early March, Sinnott-Armstrong has been making t… [+4874 chars]
